item.title: My Journey Begins
item.description: Hello there ðŸ‘‹ After becoming tired of working in a job for which I have no interest, I have finally decided to go after the thing I have wanted the most. Working in the field of software development. Over the next 20 weeks my goal is to become as good at software development as I can with the hopes of being hired as a software developer. I am currently a student who is coming back to school a little later on in life.
